#Problem 1

```{r}

df<-tibble(
num_vec <- c(1,2,3,NA,5),
cha_vec <- c("a","b",NA,"d","c"))

rep_miss<- function(x){
  
  if(is.numeric(x)){
    x[is.na(x)] = mean(x, na.rm = T)
    
  } else if (is.character(x)){
     x[is.na(x)] = "virginica"
   
  } else{
    stop("col that are not type dbl or chr will be ignored")
  }
  tibble(x)

}

output = map(df, rep_miss) 

output


```

```{r}
iris_with_missing %>% map(rep_miss) %>% tibble
```
